alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Harrison and northwestern Jackson Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Wiggins to 10 miles east of Saucier. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wade and Vancleave. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
